mapper.insert: insert into member_tbl values (#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAddr}, #{memberAddrDetail}, 3, default, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member_tbl where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update member_tbl set member_pw = #{memberPw}, member_phone = #{memberPhone}, member_email = #{memberEmail}, member_addr = #{memberAddr}, member_addrDetail = #{memberAddrDetail} where member_id = #{memberId}
